item.title: Backstage Buffing Brush
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: With the expertise of its Backstage Makeup Artists, Dior has created a professional line of brushes for perfect, tailor-made makeup application.
item.content:encoded:
With the expertise of its Backstage Makeup Artists, Dior has created a professional line of brushes for perfect, tailor-made makeup application.

Specially designed for use with Diorskin Airflash Spray Foundation, this brush reproduces the effect created by our Backstage Makeup Artists.
The wide, dense and beveled brush head in synthetic hair has been sculpted to form a reservoir that makes it easier to apply just the right amount of makeup for customized coverage.
Its unique shape follows the contours of the face and
neck to spread, smooth and polish the foundation to the extreme.The short brush handle allows you to move even closer to the face and neck for effortless, ultra-precise application.

item.title: Fluid Foundation Brush
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: With the expertise of its Backstage Makeup Artists, Dior has created a professional line of brushes for perfect, simple makeup application. For use with fluid and cream foundations, this innovative brush combines the responsiveness of synthetic fibers with the softness of natural fibers. Both layered and tapered, these fibers help blend the foundation for fast, easy application. The "cat's tongue" shape of the brush head allows easy application of an ultra-fine film of foundation to the skin.
item.content:encoded:
With the expertise of its Backstage Makeup Artists, Dior has created a professional line of brushes for perfect, simple makeup application.
For use with fluid and cream foundations, this innovative brush combines the responsiveness of synthetic fibers with the softness of natural fibers. Both layered and tapered, these fibers help blend the foundation for fast, easy application. The “cat’s tongue” shape of the brush head allows easy application of an ultra-fine film of foundation to the skin.

item.title: Pinceau Pouceau
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: A supple, silky brush designed to evenly apply powder or blush. Its curved shape adapts to the contours of the face. An essential makeup accessory for a flawless complexion.
item.content:encoded: A supple, silky brush designed to evenly apply powder or blush. Its curved shape adapts to the contours of the face. An essential makeup accessory for a flawless complexion.

item.title: Les Beiges
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: A brush that is soft to the touch and delightful to use. Very dense bristles that pick up powder easily and apply it precisely to the skin. A perfectly smooth, even and impeccable makeup result. A retractable deluxe accessory that slips easily into a handbag.
item.content:encoded: A brush that is soft to the touch and delightful to use. Very dense bristles that pick up powder easily and apply it precisely to the skin. A perfectly smooth, even and impeccable makeup result. A retractable deluxe accessory that slips easily into a handbag.

item.title: Million Lashes Mascara
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: Voluminous Million Lashes Mascara has a revolutionary collagen infused formula and Millionizer Brush for amplified volume and definition. -The luxurious, buildable, No Clump Formula amplifies each lash instantly. Glides on smoothly, and lasts all day, while thickening and separating every lash for a clump-free, smudge-free look. -The Millionizer Brush is uniquely designed to amplify and seprate lashes from corner to corner while building breathtaking volume. -The built-in Clean Sweep Wiping System wipes the brush free of clumps leaving the perfect amount of mascara for an ultra-volumized clean lash look. Fragrance-free. Ophthalmologist-tested and allergy-tested. Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
item.content:encoded: Voluminous Million Lashes Mascara has a revolutionary collagen infused formula and Millionizer Brush for amplified volume and definition. -The luxurious, buildable, No Clump Formula amplifies each lash instantly. Glides on smoothly, and lasts all day, while thickening and separating every lash for a clump-free, smudge-free look. -The Millionizer Brush is uniquely designed to amplify and seprate lashes from corner to corner while building breathtaking volume. -The built-in Clean Sweep Wiping System wipes the brush free of clumps leaving the perfect amount of mascara for an ultra-volumized clean lash look. Fragrance-free. Ophthalmologist-tested and allergy-tested. Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.

item.title: Butterfly Mascara
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
L'Oral Paris presents more than just mascara, Voluminous Butterfly Sculpt. Get 3 sculpting effects in 1 for deeper, darker, fuller lashes. Exclusive Sculpting Wing Tip Brush technology: inner bristles fill in lash line for a no gap tightline effect, brush reservoir loads entire lash with maximum volume, outer bristles fan out lashcorners to the extreme.
Tightline at the roots: Position brush at lash root and wiggle to fill gap between every lash. Fanned Out Volume: Pull brush through tip of lashes to sculpt full volume.
item.content:encoded:
L’Oral Paris presents more than just mascara, Voluminous Butterfly Sculpt. Get 3 sculpting effects in 1 for deeper, darker, fuller lashes. Exclusive Sculpting Wing Tip Brush technology: inner bristles fill in lash line for a no gap tightline effect, brush reservoir loads entire lash with maximum volume, outer bristles fan out lashcorners to the extreme.

Tightline at the roots: Position brush at lash root and wiggle to fill gap between every lash. Fanned Out Volume: Pull brush through tip of lashes to sculpt full volume.

item.title: Black
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: Enjoy flawlessly clean lines as precise as 0.4mm with The Super Slim by Infallible Never Fail. The ultra-fine felt tip gives you total control, delivering the perfect amount of liner. The intense quick dry 12 HR formula glides on smoothly with continuous and even flow. In one stroke create sleek and sophisticated eyes
item.content:encoded: Enjoy flawlessly clean lines as precise as 0.4mm with The Super Slim by Infallible Never Fail. The ultra-fine felt tip gives you total control, delivering the perfect amount of liner. The intense quick dry 12 HR formula glides on smoothly with continuous and even flow. In one stroke create sleek and sophisticated eyes

item.title: Lacquer Liner 24H
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
High-shine lacquer finish. Smooth application. Lasts 24 hours.
A glossy, lacquered eye is now easier than ever to create. Infallible Gel Lacquer Liner 24H glides on smoothly for a clean, precise line that keeps an intense, high-shine finish from dawn to dusk. Available in 5 rich, luminous shades.
item.content:encoded:
High-shine lacquer finish. Smooth application. Lasts 24 hours.

A glossy, lacquered eye is now easier than ever to create. Infallible Gel Lacquer Liner 24H glides on smoothly for a clean, precise line that keeps an intense, high-shine finish from dawn to dusk. Available in 5 rich, luminous shades.

item.title: Genius Gel Super Charged Foundation
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
The Marc Jacobs Genius Gel Super Charged Foundation is a breakthrough gel formula that provides radiance and clarity. Formulated with Buoyancy Gel technology for a weightless, natural veil. An infusion of Soft Focus Powder reflects light to minimize imperfection. Multi-vitamins provide hydration and luxurious wear.
Available in 16 skin-matching shades.
1 fl oz
#MJ-COMPXTION-GEL
item.content:encoded:
The Marc Jacobs Genius Gel Super Charged Foundation is a breakthrough gel formula that provides radiance and clarity. Formulated with Buoyancy Gel technology for a weightless, natural veil. An infusion of Soft Focus Powder reflects light to minimize imperfection. Multi-vitamins provide hydration and luxurious wear.

Available in 16 skin-matching shades.

1 fl oz

#MJ-COMPXTION-GEL

item.title: Remedy Concealer Pen
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
The Marc Jacobs Remedy Concealer Pen refreshes dehydrated and fatigued skin with an all-in-one eraser and brightener. Formulated with an exclusive anti-aging complex. Patented palladium tip cools and smooths skin on contact.
Available in 7 shades. Also available: a universal brightener in 'Bright Idea' and a universal corrector in 'Stand Corrected'.
0.08 fl
item.content:encoded:
The Marc Jacobs Remedy Concealer Pen refreshes dehydrated and fatigued skin with an all-in-one eraser and brightener. Formulated with an exclusive anti-aging complex. Patented palladium tip cools and smooths skin on contact.

Available in 7 shades. Also available: a universal brightener in ‘Bright Idea’ and a universal corrector in ‘Stand Corrected’.

0.08 fl
